page.title: Messages
page.t: Station [blue]%s[/blue] AI: The Price of [blue]%s[/blue] = [red]%s[/red]. This is lower than minimum price of good ([green]%s[/green]).
Station [blue]%s[/blue] AI: The Price of [blue]%s[/blue] = [red]%s[/red]. This is greater or equal maximum price of good ([green]%s[/green]).
Station [blue]%s[/blue] AI: The Storage is full.
Station [blue]%s[/blue] AI: The price of ware [blue]%s[/blue] will updates between [green]%s[/green] and [green]%s[/green].
